title: Madagascar boat accident kills at least 83 people; police chief swims 12 hours to shore after helicopter crash at site
content:
1. Madagascar boat accident kills at least 83 people; police chief swims 12 hours to shore after helicopter crash at site  CNN
  2. Madagascar: Minister 'swims for 12 hours' after helicopter crashes at sea  BBC News
  3. Scores killed in Madagascar shipwreck, helicopter disaster  Yahoo News
  4. Madagascar police chief swims for 12 hours after helicopter crash  Al Jazeera English
  5. Madagascar Minister Swims 12 Hours to Shore After Helicopter Crash  Bloomberg

localize.title: マダガスカルのボート事故、少なくとも83人死亡 現場でヘリ墜落、警察署長が12時間泳いで岸へ
马达加斯加船只事故造成至少83人死亡；直升机在现场坠毁后，警察局长游了12小时才上岸
馬達加斯加船隻事故造成至少83人死亡；直升機在現場墜毀後，警察局長遊了12小時才上岸
